item.title: Kid goes insane after 17 hours of MW2
item.dc:creator: @atrox atrox_
item.description:
@atrox wrote:

[quote=“Frell, post:48, topic:314124”][quote author=Yz85Racer link=topic=410605.msg3078181#msg3078181 date=1261980797]
I played the game for about 7 hours straight when I got it, and about 4 the next day. Other than that; I hardly play it now. It just seems soo… repetitive? Once you’ve played Call of Duty 4 for a while, the rest seem so similiar. Not sure why, but I still like call of duty 4 better.
[/quote]
I could play cod 4 nonstop, but that was also the first year i had XBL. Then WAW i stopped around 3rd prestige.[/quote]
I did play CoD nonstop for quite some time, didn’t really care about prestige etc but WaW/MW2 I’ve barely played.

Read full topic
item.source: Kid goes insane after 17 hours of MW2

item.title: Kid goes insane after 17 hours of MW2
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Yz85Racer:

I played the game for about 7 hours straight when I got it, and about 4 the next day. Other than that; I hardly play it now. It just seems soo… repetitive? Once you’ve played Call of Duty 4 for a while, the rest seem so similiar. Not sure why, but I still like call of duty 4 better.

I agree. I have a small band of friends that play call of duty non stop and never get bored. One of my friends got to 10th prestige and made a new account and started over.

I got to 1st prestige within 4 days of it coming out, and then i got bored and just stopped playing it.

I could play cod 4 nonstop, but that was also the first year i had XBL. Then WAW i stopped around 3rd prestige.

Read full topic
